Once upon a time, Antoine wrote :

> Hi, I wanted to know if I could post a request for rpm on the list, or if
> I had to contact Mathias directly ?
> Thanks...

Well, since you posted, you could have asked just in case while you were at
it ;-) I don't often fulfill requests, so don't expect any miracles :-/

Matthias
